subject: Boxing
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Bernard Hopkins was fined $200,000 by the Nevada State Athletic Commission for instigating a brawl at the weigh-in before his fight last month with Winky Wright. Hopkins’s fine, left to the discretion of the five-member panel, amounts to 6 percent of the $3 million purse he won after scoring a unanimous decision against Wright on July 20.
